sections.title: Overview: Framer vs Wix Studio
paragraphs: **Framer**: Design-first website builder with React-native core that transforms visual designs into production-ready React components. **Wix Studio**: Advanced visual web builder designed for professional designers and developers with full creative control. Features pixel-perfect editing, flexible responsive design, AI-powered tools, and real-time collaboration.. Users appreciate it for visual-builder and web-design.
